Title: InputDialog ASP.NET WebControl
Description:
The InputDialog is a customizable webform dialog that collects data from a user via a popup window or DHTML layer programmatically on the client.

The dialog is invoked by a standard HTML button or custom image button and it returns the collected data back to a hidden or visible
